product_name: Sugoi RSR Split Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made of ultralight fabric with a split hem and built-in liner brief, the women's Sugoi RSR Split Shorts offer freed-up comfort you'll love during long runs in warm weather. Polyester/spandex fabric is light, airy, moisture-wicking and quick-drying. Polyester crepe liner briefs provide excellent breathability and wick moisture; mesh inserts enhance overall ventilation. Inside key pocket; zippered rear pocket for energy snacks. The women's Sugoi RSR Split shorts feature a 3/4 split side panel that offers a full range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: Made of ultralight fabric with a split hem and built-in liner brief, the women's Sugoi RSR Split Shorts offer freed-up comfort you'll love during long runs in warm weather.
